name: NuGetPackCreator
description: Create a nuget package without having to write any line of code.
author: Carlos Parra

inputs.name: source
inputs.label: Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Source where the NuGet package will be created from.

inputs.name: nuspecPath
inputs.label: Path to nuspec file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the nuspec file.

inputs.name: overridetags
inputs.label: Want to override tags from nuspec file?

inputs.name: assemblyPath
inputs.label: Path to assemblies files you want to pack in the NuGet package
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the assemblies files to be included in the package. You can separate multiple files with a semicolon. To omit a .csproj or .nuspec file, just prefix it with '!'. Example: $/dev/package/first.nuspec;!$/dev/package/first.nuspec
